IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO STRENGHTEN OUR COMMUNITY BY HELPING PEOPLE IMPROVE THEIR LIVES AND CARE FOR ONE ANOTHER
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO STRENGHTEN OUR COMMUNITY BY HELPING PEOPLE IMPROVE THEIR LIVES AND CARE FOR ONE ANOTHER
IRS990.Description: WHEN YOU INVEST IN THE COMMUNITY FUND, YOUR DONATION IS COMBINED WITH THOSE OF YOUR NEIGHBORS, GIVING YOU THE POWER TO CHANGE LIVES TODAY AND IN THE FUTURE. BY MAKING A RESULTS-BASED INVESTMENT THROUGH OUR COMMUNITY FUND, YOU ARE SUPPORTING LONG-LASTING, MEASURABLE CHANGE IN PEOPLE'S LIVES RIGHT HERE IN ASHEVILLE AND BUNCOMBE COUNTY. VOLUNTEERS WITH TREMENDOUS KNOWLEDGE IN EDUCATION, INCOME AND HEALTH OVERSEE A COMPETITIVE GRANT PROCESS IN WHICH THE MOST EFFECTIVE COMMUNITY PARTNERS WHOSE RESULTS BEST ALIGN WITH THE CHANGES OUR COMMUNITY NEEDS TO SEE RECEIVE UNITED WAY INVESTMENTS. UNITED WAY OF ASHEVILLE AND BUNCOMBE COUNTY HELPS YOU TAKE COLLECTIVE ACTION THROUGH GIVING, ADVOCATING AND VOLUNTEERING IN THE AREAS OF EDUCATION, INCOME AND HEALTH. INVESTING IN THE COMMUNITY FUND IS A GREAT WAY TO DO THAT

Activity2.Description: UNITED WAY'S 2-1-1 IS A FREE, CONFIDENTIAL COMMUNITY SERVICE INFORMATION LINE LINKING PEOPLE TO HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES IN BUNCOMBE, HENDERSON, MADISON AND TRANSLYVANIA COUNTIES. TRAINED REFERRAL SPECIALISTS ARE AVAILABLE 24/7 TO ANSWER CALLS FROM SPEAKERS OF ALL LANGUAGES. BY LISTENING CAREFULLE, ASKING THE RIGHT QUESTIONS, AND ACCESSING OUR DATABASE CONTAINING MORE THAN 2,000 PROGRAMS, OUR STAFF WORK TO IDENTIFY THE BEST RESOURCES FOR CALLERS. IN 2009, 2-1-1 WNC RECEIVED 63,504 INQUIRIES, INCLUDING 30% MORE CALLS THAN THE PREVIOUS YEAR AND TRACKED 1,093,823 IN FINANCIAL NEEDS ASSOCIATED WITH CALLERS' REQUESTS FOR INFORMATION.

Activity3.Description: HANDS ON ASHEVILLE-BUNCOMBE MAKES IT EASY FOR INDIVIDUALS, FAMILIES AND GROUPS TO LEND A HAND IN MEANINGFUL SERVICE TO OUR COMMUNITY BY VOLUNTEERING WITH LOCAL NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS. VOLUNTEERS CAN CALL OR USE THE ONLINE DATABASE TO FIND AN OPPORTUNITY THAT WORKS FOR THEM: THEIR PASSIONS, THEIR SKILLS, THEIR SCHEDULES. MANY PROJECTS LAST JUST TWO TO THREE HOURS, OCCUR ON EVENINGS AND WEEKEND AND DON'T REQUIRE LONG-TERM COMMITMENTS.

ActivityOther.Description: OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES SUCH AS COMMUNITY PLANNING, AGENCY RELATIONS, STRATEGIC PLANNING AND PARTERSHIP CULTIVATION

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: SEE RECEIVE UNITED WAY INVESTMENTS. UNITED WAY OF ASHEVILLE AND BUNCOMBE COUNTY HELPS YOU TAKE COLLECTIVE ACTION THROUGH GIVING, ADVOCATING AND VOLUNTEERING IN THE AREAS OF EDUCATION, INCOME AND HEALTH. INVESTING IN THE COMMUNITY FUND IS A GREAT WAY TO DO THAT
OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES SUCH AS COMMUNITY PLANNING, AGENCY RELATIONS, STRATEGIC PLANNING AND PARTERSHIP CULTIVATION

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS USED TO REVIEW FORM 990
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE 990 IS PRESENTED TO THE FINANCE COMMITTEE AND THEN TO THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE BEFORE IT IS FILED WITH THE IRS
IN MAY OF EACH YEAR BEFORE THE ALLOCATIONS ARE APPROVED FOR THE AGENCIES, THE BOARD MEMBERS ARE ASKED TO DISCLOSE INTERESTS THAT COULD GIVE RISE TO CONFLICTS
FOR THE CEO, THE INFORMATION USED IS PROVIDED IN THE SALARY SURVEYS FROM UNITED WAY WORLD WIDE FOR THE SOUTHERN REGION ALONG WITH INFORMATION PROVIDED BY LIKE-SIZED UNITED WAYS WITHIN NORTH CAROLINA.
FOR ALL OTHER EMPLOYEES THE INFORMATION USED IS PROVIDED IN THE SALARY SURVEYS FROM UNITED WAY OF WORLD WIDE FOR THE SOUTHERN REGION.
UPON REQUEST, THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE PROVIDED.
